verses.text: And these \add are the countries\add* which the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w inherited|strong="H5157"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, which \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, and the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, distributed for \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* to them.

By \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \add was\add* their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, for the \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w*, and \add for\add* the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*.

For \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* had \w given|strong="H5414"\w* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* and an \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*: but unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* none \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them.

For the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* were \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w*, \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* and \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*: therefore they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* no \w part|strong="H2506"\w* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, save \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \add in\add*, with their \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* for their \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* and for their \w substance|strong="H7075"\w*.

As the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, so the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, and they \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ Then the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w came|strong="H5066"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* in \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*: and \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w* the \w Kenezite|strong="H7074"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* concerning \w me|strong="H0182"\w* and \w thee|strong="H0182"\w* in \w Kadesh-barnea|strong="H6947"\w*.

\w Forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \add was\add* I when \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me from \w Kadesh-barnea|strong="H6947"\w* to espy \w out|strong="H7270"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; and I \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* him \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* as \add it was\add* in mine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

Nevertheless my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* that went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with me made the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w melt|strong="H4529"\w*: but I \w wholly|strong="H4390"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Surely the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whereon thy \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* have \w trodden|strong="H1869"\w* shall be thine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, and thy \w children’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, because thou hast \w wholly|strong="H4390"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And now, behold, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath kept me \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*, as he \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, these \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, even \w since|strong="H0227"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* this \w word|strong="H1697"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, while \add the children of\add* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w wandered|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: and now, lo, I \add am\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*.  +  r 14.10  t wandered: Heb. walked *

As yet I \add am as\add* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* as \add I was\add* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me: as my \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \add was\add* then, even so \add is\add* my \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* now, for \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, both to go \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and to come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.

Now therefore \w give|strong="H5414"\w* me this \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, whereof the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; for thou \w heardest|strong="H8085"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* how the \w Anakims|strong="H6062"\w* \add were\add* there, and \add that\add* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add were\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add and\add* \w fenced|strong="H1219"\w*: if so \w be|strong="H0194"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add will be\add* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* me, then I shall be able to drive them \w out|strong="H3423"\w*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* him, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* for an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

\w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* therefore became the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w* the \w Kenezite|strong="H7074"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, because that he \w wholly|strong="H4390"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \add was\add* \w Kirjath-arba|strong="H7153"\w*; \add which Arba was\add* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* among the \w Anakims|strong="H6062"\w*. And the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* had \w rest|strong="H8252"\w* from \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.
